Package comp3111.popnames

Class Task4

java.lang.Object
comp3111.popnames.Task4
public class Task4
extends java.lang.Object
This class deals mainly with Task 4 and contains only static functions to validate data and execute the main query.

    • NK_T4

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> NK_T4​(java.lang.String dName, int dYOB, java.lang.String mName, int mYOB, int vYear)
      NK-T4 Algorithm of task 4.
      Parameters:
      dName - the name of the Dad.
      dYOB - the date of birth of the Dad.
      mName - the name of the Mom.
      mYOB - the date of birth of the Mom.
      vYear - the vintage Year specifying the child's preferred year
      Returns:
      the Arraylist containing recommended boys and girl names

    • similarity_recommendation

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> similarity_recommendation​(java.lang.String dName, int dYOB, java.lang.String mName, int mYOB, int vYear)
      string similarity Algorithm of task 4.
      Parameters:
      dName - the name of the Dad.
      dYOB - the date of birth of the Dad.
      mName - the name of the Mom.
      mYOB - the date of birth of the Mom.
      vYear - the vintage Year specifying the child's preferred year
      Returns:
      the Arraylist containing recommended boys and girl names

    • recommendation

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> recommendation​(java.lang.String dName, int dYOB, java.lang.String mName, int mYOB, int vYear, java.lang.String choice)
      Main query function of task 4. Validate and parses inputs to the algorithm. Saves logs.
      Parameters:
      dName - the name of the Dad.
      dYOB - the date of birth of the Dad.
      mName - the name of the Mom.
      mYOB - the date of birth of the Mom.
      vYear - the vintage Year specifying the child's preferred year
      choice - the option determines whether to use the NK-T4 or the string similarity algorithm
      Returns:
      the Arraylist containing recommended boys and girl names
